forecast.name: Tonight
forecast.detailedForecast: Mostly clear, with a low around 54. Southwest wind 3 to 7 mph.

forecast.name: Thursday
forecast.detailedForecast: Sunny. High near 69, with temperatures falling to around 67 in the afternoon. Southwest wind 3 to 12 mph.

weather_report:
As twilight blankets Downtown San Francisco, the air carries a calm assurance, hinting at the clarity that promises a beautiful day ahead. Currently, skies are mostly clear, with the temperature settling in around a mild 54 degrees, creating an inviting atmosphere tinged with the soft whispers of a light southwest wind. The golden hues of streetlights begin to twinkle against the darkening backdrop, though the fog—a characteristic of this coastal gem—lingers just beyond the horizon. It appears that the marine layer is keeping its distance, allowing the city to breathe and glow against a sea of tranquility.

Looking forward to Thursday, a sunny embrace is expected, with temperatures reaching towards the comfortable 69 degrees. As the day unfolds, the forecast promises a slight dip in warmth as afternoon approaches, yet the gentle roll of the wind will keep things pleasant and refreshing. For those stepping out, a light sweater or a windbreaker would be wise, catering to the shifting climate as day transitions to night. It’s an excellent time to meander through the nearby parks or perhaps enjoy a leisurely stroll along the waterfront, taking in the simple pleasures of life as the sun bathes the city in warmth and light.
